## Release Checklist

### Phase 1: Pre-Release Preparation

**Version Management:**
- [ ] Run `python3 scripts/bump_version.py X.Y.Z --auto-update --validate-notes`
- [ ] Verify version updated in: README.md, CLAUDE.md, PRD.md, _version.py
- [ ] Update CHANGELOG.md with release notes
- [ ] Create release notes: `docs/archive/summaries/vX.Y.Z-release-notes.md`

**Validation:**
- [ ] Run `python3 scripts/pre_release_check.py --verbose`
- [ ] Verify git status clean (no uncommitted changes)
- [ ] All tests pass (`python3 -m pytest tests/`)
- [ ] Security scans clean (`python3 tests/test_security.py`)
- [ ] Coverage ≥80% overall, ≥95% security (`coverage report`)

**GitHub Projects:**
- [ ] All milestone issues closed or moved to next release
- [ ] Project board updated (all items in "Done" column)
- [ ] Milestone issues have acceptance criteria checked

### Phase 2: Build & Package

**Build Process:**
- [ ] Clean previous builds: `rm -rf dist/ build/ *.egg-info`
- [ ] Build package: `python3 -m build`
- [ ] Run smoke tests: `python3 scripts/smoke_test.py dist/*.whl --verbose`

**Smoke Test Validation:**
- [ ] Package installs in isolated environment
- [ ] CLI entry point works (`vscan --version`)
- [ ] Core commands functional (scan, cache, config)
- [ ] Exit codes correct (0, 1, 2)
- [ ] Help text displays correctly
- [ ] Dependencies resolve correctly

### Phase 3: Version Control

**Git Workflow:**
- [ ] Review changes: `git diff`
- [ ] Stage release files: `git add` (CHANGELOG.md, README.md, CLAUDE.md, PRD.md, _version.py, release notes)
- [ ] Create release commit: `git commit -m "chore(release): prepare vX.Y.Z release"`
- [ ] Create annotated tag: `git tag -a vX.Y.Z -m "Release vX.Y.Z: <summary>"`
- [ ] Push commit: `git push origin main`
- [ ] Push tag: `git push origin vX.Y.Z`

**GitHub Release:**
- [ ] Wait for GitHub Actions workflow to complete
- [ ] Verify draft release created: `gh release list`
- [ ] Review release assets (wheel, source, SHA256SUMS)
- [ ] Edit and publish release on GitHub

**Milestone Closure:**
- [ ] Close all milestone issues with release comment
- [ ] Move project board items to "Done"
- [ ] Close milestone: `gh api repos/jvlivonius/vsc-extension-scanner/milestones/<number> -X PATCH -F state=closed`

### Phase 4: Post-Release

**Verification:**
- [ ] Test installation from GitHub: `pip install https://github.com/jvlivonius/vsc-extension-scanner/releases/download/vX.Y.Z/<file>.whl`
- [ ] Verify version: `vscan --version` shows vX.Y.Z
- [ ] Run integration test: `./vscan scan --publisher microsoft`

**Documentation:**
- [ ] Archive roadmap to `docs/archive/plans/vX.Y.Z-roadmap.md`
- [ ] Update STATUS.md with new version and metrics
- [ ] Update project board with next milestone

**Communication:**
- [ ] Announce release (if applicable)
- [ ] Update README badges (if version scheme changed)
- [ ] Close this release tracking issue
